outputs.output_descr: The project aims at providing technical assistance to the government of Bangladesh in initiating strategic interventions in the area of civil service of Bangladesh that facilitates the implementation of programme for generating improvements and gradual transformation in the civil service. Against this backdrop, the project comprises three components: (a) Managing change in the civil service; (b) Capacity development of training institutions; and (c) Ethics and integrity in civil service.

project_descr: Civil Service Capacity Development for 21st Century - Bangladesh Public Administration Training Centre (BPATC)
project_title: Civil Service Capacity for 21st Century - BPATC
